meanings.definition: A type of rocket fuel consisting of two separate propellants that are mixed and burned together.
meanings.sent1: The spaceship used bipropellants to launch into space.
meanings.sent2: Rocket scientists carefully studied the bipropellants before the launch.
meanings.sent3: The bipropellants in the rocket were so excited to blast off together.
meanings.sent4: The bipropellants danced in harmony as they propelled the rocket forward.
meanings.sent5: The powerful bipropellants roared as they ignited, pushing the rocket upwards.

meanings.definition: The act of using bipropellants in a rocket engine for propulsion.
meanings.sent1: The successful launch was attributed to the efficient use of bipropellants.
meanings.sent2: Engineers monitored the bipropellants' performance during the mission.
meanings.sent3: The bipropellants threw a party in the rocket engine to celebrate their hard work.
meanings.sent4: The bipropellants worked tirelessly, never giving up on their mission.
meanings.sent5: The astronauts marveled at the precision of the bipropellants as they propelled the rocket forward.
